# Support

## Getting Help

If you need help with this project, there are several ways to get support:

### GitHub Issues

The primary way to get support is through GitHub Issues. Before creating a new issue:

1. Check if your question has already been answered in existing issues
2. Search through closed issues as well
3. Make sure your issue is not a duplicate

When creating an issue:
- Use a clear and descriptive title
- Provide as much relevant information as possible
- Include steps to reproduce the issue if applicable
- Share any error messages or logs
- Specify your environment details (OS, version, etc.)

### Documentation

- Check the [README.md](../README.md) for basic usage and setup instructions

## Contributing

We welcome contributions! If you'd like to contribute:

1. Fork the repository
2. Create a new branch for your feature or fix
3. Make your changes
4. Submit a pull request

Please ensure your code follows our coding standards and includes appropriate tests.

## Code of Conduct

Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.

## Security Issues

If you discover a security vulnerability, please do not create a public issue. Instead, please contact us directly at [info@codilas.com](mailto:info@codilas.com).

## Commercial Support

For commercial support, enterprise features, or custom development needs, please contact [info@codilas.com](mailto:info@codilas.com).
